did.abstract: Correspondence recommending and rejecting David Barg for Officer Candidate School and some military records, including separation paperwork, document some of Captain Barg's time in the U.S. military between 1936 and 1946.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: David William Barg was born December 22, 1918, in Houston, Texas, to Ike and Esther Barg. David grew up in Houston and attended Milby High School where he served in R.O.T.C. After graduating in 1937 David attended Rice University, graduating in 1940. He served in the U.S. Army during World War II.
David married Mozelle Elise Gerson in Houston in 1949.
David died November 18, 1999, in Houston and is buried in the Beth Yeshurun Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Correspondence recommending and rejecting David Barg for Officer Candidate School and some military records, including separation paperwork, document some of Captain Barg's time in the U.S. military between 1936 and 1946.
